name: Knightform
description:
Knightform is a VERY early prototype of a pretty basic mini-platformer. This is not meant to be a high quality game but a way for me to learn and grow in experience. I've been enjoying developing this game for a bit of time and I feel like I would like to share it and get some feedback about it. There are currently 3 fairly simple levels which will likely be expanded soon.

The Controls:

Moving - A/D  or <-/->

Jumping  - Space

Attack - Left Click (Hold)

Interact - F

Warnings/Reminder:

I do not own ANY of the assets used in the game. All audio is not mine. I only programmed the game.
